timeline.bodyText: Why add new overloads ? I personally prefer to add  overloads only if it's must,  else too many methods would effect the readability of public api's . We spent a lot of time cleaning up the overloads already and we introduced AcquireTokenParameters for this reason . Since we expose Fragment through AcquireTokenParameters the developers should be able to use that.
timeline.author: kreedula
